actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mouther makes two bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (2d6) piercing damage  and the target makes a DC 10 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure. If the target is killed by this attack  it is absorbed into the mouther.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The mouther can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Gibbering Mouths
special_abilities.desc: The mouther babbles constantly. A living non-aberration creature that starts its turn within 30 feet and can hear its gibbering makes a DC 10 Intelligence saving throw. On a failure, the creature is confused until the start of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Reality Eater
special_abilities.desc: The ground within 15 feet of the mouther is the consistency of sucking mud and is difficult terrain to all creatures except the mouther. Each non-aberrant creature that starts its turn in the area or enters it for the first time on its turn makes a DC 10 Strength saving throw. On a failure, its Speed is reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.
